class.name: OpenXRAndroidHitResult
class.brief_description: The result of a raycast hit (from [code]XR_ANDROID_raycast[/code]).
class.description: The result of a raycast hit (from [code]XR_ANDROID_raycast[/code]). See also [OpenXRAndroidRaycastExtension].

method.name: get_pose
method.description: Get the [Transform3D] of the raycast hit.

method.name: get_tracker
method.description: Get the [OpenXRAndroidTrackableTracker] that is associated with the hit result.
